other_tests.findings: The gallbladder is distended with wall edema measuring approximately 4 mm in thickness. Pericholecystic fluid is present. There are three intraluminal gallstones: two mobile and one immobile positioned in the gallbladder neck. The common bile duct is not dilated, measuring 3 mm. The liver shows no focal or textural abnormalities, and the spleen is normal.
